s: Welcome to Brownswood Recordings, the London-based indie label from globe trotting purveyor of all sounds soulful and inspired.

Brownswood Recordings. London, UK. Brownswood Recordings is the independent record label founded by DJ, record collector and broadcaster Gilles Peterson. Started in 2006, it’s a platform for new artists and music creatives, as well as an outlet for established acts to do something different.

t: ARTISTS - Brownswood Recordings - Brownswood Official Store

s: Brownswood Recordings is the independent label belonging to the DJ and broadcaster Gilles Peterson. Founded in 2006 the aim of the label was to provide a platform for the many unsigned artists that were sending their music to Gilles to play on his late night BBC Radio 1 show.
